# id: BeanAnnotationHelper -> public static boolean isBeanAnnotated(Method method)
commentText: Return whether the given method is annotated directly or indirectly with @Bean.
codeText: public static boolean isBeanAnnotated(Method method) {_		return AnnotationUtils.findAnnotation(method, Bean.class) != null__	}
